batchgetitem.name: BatchGetItem
batchgetitem.description: Grants permission to return the attributes of one or more items from one or more tables

batchwriteitem.name: BatchWriteItem
batchwriteitem.description: Grants permission to put or delete multiple items in one or more tables

conditioncheckitem.name: ConditionCheckItem
conditioncheckitem.description: Grants permission to the ConditionCheckItem operation that checks the existence of a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

createcluster.name: CreateCluster
createcluster.description: Grants permission to create a DAX cluster

createparametergroup.name: CreateParameterGroup
createparametergroup.description: Grants permission to create a parameter group

createsubnetgroup.name: CreateSubnetGroup
createsubnetgroup.description: Grants permission to create a subnet group

decreasereplicationfactor.name: DecreaseReplicationFactor
decreasereplicationfactor.description: Grants permission to remove one or more nodes from a DAX cluster

deletecluster.name: DeleteCluster
deletecluster.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned DAX cluster

deleteitem.name: DeleteItem
deleteitem.description: Grants permission to delete a single item in a table by primary key

deleteparametergroup.name: DeleteParameterGroup
deleteparametergroup.description: Grants permission to delete the specified parameter group

deletesubnetgroup.name: DeleteSubnetGroup
deletesubnetgroup.description: Grants permission to delete a subnet group

describeclusters.name: DescribeClusters
describeclusters.description: Grants permission to return information about all provisioned DAX clusters

describedefaultparameters.name: DescribeDefaultParameters
describedefaultparameters.description: Grants permission to return the default system parameter information for DAX

describeevents.name: DescribeEvents
describeevents.description: Grants permission to return events related to DAX clusters and parameter groups

describeparametergroups.name: DescribeParameterGroups
describeparametergroups.description: Grants permission to return a list of parameter group descriptions

describeparameters.name: DescribeParameters
describeparameters.description: Grants permission to return the detailed parameter list for a particular parameter group

describesubnetgroups.name: DescribeSubnetGroups
describesubnetgroups.description: Grants permission to return a list of subnet group descriptions

getitem.name: GetItem
getitem.description: Grants permission to the GetItem operation that returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

increasereplicationfactor.name: IncreaseReplicationFactor
increasereplicationfactor.description: Grants permission to add one or more nodes to a DAX cluster

listtags.name: ListTags
listtags.description: Grants permission to return a list all of the tags for a DAX cluster

putitem.name: PutItem
putitem.description: Grants permission to create a new item, or replace an old item with a new item

query.name: Query
query.description: Grants permission to use the primary key of a table or a secondary index to directly access items from that table or index

rebootnode.name: RebootNode
rebootnode.description: Grants permission to reboot a single node of a DAX cluster

scan.name: Scan
scan.description: Grants permission to return one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item in a table or a secondary index

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to associate a set of tags with a DAX resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove the association of tags from a DAX resource

updatecluster.name: UpdateCluster
updatecluster.description: Grants permission to modify the settings for a DAX cluster

updateitem.name: UpdateItem
updateitem.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the table if it does not already exist

updateparametergroup.name: UpdateParameterGroup
updateparametergroup.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a parameter group

updatesubnetgroup.name: UpdateSubnetGroup
updatesubnetgroup.description: Grants permission to modify an existing subnet group
